name: nlincsofc
0:
”Alexa open n. lincs”
”Alexa start n. lincs”
”Alexa launch n. lincs”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. lincs
Developer Terms of Use
des:
nLincs Catalog link for a specific store can be shared via SMS and latest Order status pertaining to a mobile number can be tracked.
Users can ask the Alexa for nLincs store catalog link for any specific store and on providing the customer mobile number, the requested catalog link will be shared through SMS. This will ease the customer's search who is looking for any nLincs store catalog.
Customer can call out their mobile number and track the latest order status pertaining to the customer mobile number. This helps the customer to track the orders easily.
